title: The Words Don’t Matter
description:
What does Linus think about changing elementary grade levels to more obscure terms like “Emerging” and “Extending.” Ft. discussion of the euphemism treadmill that results in words constantly being replaced with essentially identical terms. 

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JIFSUV3WF8M
